title: pbe for oce
body:
can u plz give us pbe for oce so we can try out new champs and skins and tell u how good thay are 
thannks

replies.body:
Hey there,

PBE signup is currently only available for users of EUW, EUNE and NA.

You'd need to create an NA, EUW or EUNE account and level that to be eligible for PBE access.
